name: Shall Lawrence
post: Nice, It warm in case of extra frolicking. Has a sort of al dente texture-some chewy.

name: Emily Watson
post: I love my multi-cooker!!! This product is amazing, it has so many cooking options, and is very easy to use.

name: Elina Mt
post: Quality product with clear and easy to use controls. I expect it will last a long time. Maintains temperature precisely.

name: Ema Watson
post: I am very pleased with the multi-cooker. I've made yogurt, risotto, soup, chili con carne, stew, sauteed chicken and rice so far.

name: Mila Kunis
post: So happy I purchased the multi-cooker..fits in with all my other KitchenAid small appliances.
